channel.title: The Daily Swig | Cybersecurity news and views
channel.description: Keeping you up to date with the latest cybersecurity news from around the world.

image.title: The Daily Swig | Cybersecurity news and views

item.title: We’re going teetotal: It’s goodbye to The Daily Swig
item.description: PortSwigger today announces that The Daily Swig is closing down

item.description: API security is a ‘great gateway’ into a pen testing career, advises specialist in the field

item.title: HTTP request smuggling bug patched in HAProxy

item.description: New legal protections for security researchers could be the strongest of any EU country
